page.title: 01THE TRENT AND EREWASH
page.content: This area borders the Rivers Trent and Erewash and includes the areas of Attenborough, Chilwell, Long Eaton and Toton all of which lie almost midway between Nottingham in the East and Derby in the West. In the north of the area the land rises to 61m and forms low sandstone hills.The main route between Nottingham and Derby runs through this area, bisecting the North South routes of the M1, Railway and the Erewash Canal. The central area slopes to the Trent flood plain.Most of this area has been developed for housing although the central area is taken up by an Ordnance Depot at Chilwell. The southern area is made up of the Trent floodland. At Trent there is a large railway junction where the rivers Trent and Soar meet.
